Title: XMLViewer
Description: A fun little Silverlight app and control that can display and XML file in pleasing manner!
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A fun little Silverlight app and control that can display an XML file in pleasing manner! Currently it is limited to how deep you make its containing div since I haven't taken the time to make it tell the DOM its expanding. Also, in the project is a test site for working with and editing the control.

Have fun!
